<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=Kerbal%2BSpace%2BProgram%2B-%2BCareer%2BMode%2BFrom%2BScratch%2521&channel=larsmaehlum&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&archive_id=496022921"></object></p>

<p><a href="http://www.twitch.tv/larsmaehlum"><strong>larsmaehlum</strong></a> is what you’d call a <em><strong>KSP</strong></em> superfan. You can find him regularly on the forum, on Twitter and now, on Twitch. You can tell he takes his science seriously, but not *too* seriously. His love for the game comes through in each stream and makes for a very human, very entertaining time during each broadcast.</p>

<p>Watch*<a href="http://www.twitch.tv/larsmaehlum"><strong>larsmaehlum</strong></a> do what he does best <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/larsmaehlum"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>
